code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{deleteFile}from"../services/deleteFile";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FileDelete=_ref=>{let{userName,deleteStatus,setDeleteStatus}=_ref;const[filesToDelete,setFilesToDelete]=useState("");const handleDeleteFiles=()=>{const fileNames=filesToDelete.split(",").map(name=>name.trim());deleteFile(userName,fileNames,setDeleteStatus);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"filesToDelete",className:"mb-2",children:"Enter file names to delete (comma separated):"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"filesToDelete",value:filesToDelete,onChange:e=>setFilesToDelete(e.target.value),className:"form-control",placeholder:"file1.txt, file2.jpg"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDeleteFiles,className:"btn btn-danger mt-2",disabled:!filesToDelete,style:{margin:"0 10px",fontSize:"1rem"},children:"Delete Files"}),deleteStatus==="success"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-success mt-2",children:"\u2705 Deleted successfully!"}),deleteStatus==="fail"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-danger mt-2",children:"\u274C Delete failed!"})]});};export default FileDelete;
